question: How can I optimize the energy consumption of my IoT devices at home, and can you generate an image of a smart home setup?

steps.content: How can I optimize the energy consumption of my IoT devices at home, and can you generate an image of a smart home setup?
Plan: 1) Search for methods to optimize energy consumption of IoT devices. 2) Generate an image of a smart home setup. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for methods to optimize energy consumption of IoT devices.
To optimize energy consumption: 1) Use smart plugs to monitor usage. 2) Schedule devices to turn off when not in use. 3) Use energy-efficient devices.
Generating an image of a smart home setup.
Image of a smart home setup generated.
Can you suggest any specific energy-efficient IoT devices?
Plan: 1) Search for specific energy-efficient IoT devices. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for specific energy-efficient IoT devices.
Energy-efficient IoT devices include: smart thermostats, LED smart bulbs, and energy-monitoring smart plugs.
